So instead of going super deep like three layers or or a deep neural network, you start thinking in terms of, well I represent my data in a in a more efficient way and then I don't need three layers of neural network, I may need to train only one or I may even do I may even be good with a linear model, even though high dimensional. And that's a way to go when you don't have enough data or you're not fully confident about the quality of your data.
